what_we_treat.description_of_disease: Spinal Infection is a disease in which the patient starts loosing back_bone power and would not be able to stand straight even for 5 minutes

treatment_techniques.technology_description: A very powerful but dangerous machine , needs to be used by only professionals having experience more than 10 years
features: Can Cure the disease in one go
Person struggling with back pain can positively be treated permanently from this treatment machine
